# 7.0 Docs

> Documentation for 7.0 Docs.

*Topics available: 1*

- [Breaking change: Globalization APIs use ICU libraries on Windows Server 2019](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/globalization/7.0/icu-globalization-api.md): Learn about the globalization breaking change in .NET 7 where ICU libraries are used for globalization functionality instead of NLS on Windows Server.
